root.name: Silly Bandz
root.description: OverviewÂ Capitalizing on the popularity of both the Silly Bandz fad and the gameplay of Angry Birds, Silly Bandz offers players 40 block-toppling, physics-based levels to complete and 200 virtual Silly Bandz to collect. An exclusive pack of 12 video game themed Silly Bandz are included in the shapes of a PlayStation style controller, arcade cabinet, pinball machine, joystick and more. A local multiplayer versus mode is included as well.
